reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable with soft, ribbed knit texture, and one notes it hangs perfectly at the waist.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Sweater
items.body: I absolutely love this black sweater. Great quality and the fit is true to size. Dress up or down. Really comfortable to wear and looks nice with outfits. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Lesley Restivo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT LOOK & FIT
items.body: Comfortable, soft, warm, the fit is perfect! Love the dolman sleeves. Going to buy more of them. Read more
items.author: Tenth Watch

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fit - worth the price
items.body: Very soft - collar does not rub, but hides neck wrinkles, backfat doesn't show! I'm 5', 125 lbs and S fit perfectly...just had to roll the sleeves a bit. I originally bought the apricot color and was a little concerned about the price, but it fit so well and so comfortably, I went back and bought the camel color too. Great stretch but doesn't lose it's shape. I rarely write reviews, but this is a great top! Read more
items.author: Rebecca T.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater for the price
items.body: This sweater is a perfect mid-weight, horizontal rib knit. The styling is exactly what I was looking for: relaxed through the bust (but not baggy), and fitted at the bottom (so it doesn’t look boxy or like a sack). The style lends itself perfectly to jeans or with dress pants or a skirt. The fabric is very soft, and no weird smell right out of the package. Ordered the black, which is gorgeous and will probably order another color as well. Read more
items.author: BaseballMom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Very well made, warm but light, and the color is very pretty. Fits well, length is perfect for high wasted pants or jeans. Read more
items.author: Sandy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight
items.body: The color pink is beautiful, light weight it a heavy sweater material. Bought one same brand last year and and it was a nice solid sweater material this is not. If your looking for a warm thick sweater this is not it. Read more
items.author: Penny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress up or dress down sweater.
items.body: Love this sweater. It is very classy. It’s not overly heavy. It is made very well. I like it because it’s roomy. Very comfortable and not real thick. I can wear a coat over it easily. Read more
items.author: SanGu3

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fall/winter staple
items.body: This sweater is perfect for the fall/winter. The camel color is super cozy and the material is soft and comforting. This sweater holds up really well in the wash and is perfect for all occasions. I love the mock neck detail because I find full turtlenecks to be too constricting this gives the sophisticated look of a turtleneck with the comfort of a crewneck. It’s perfect for all occasions. Read more
items.author: Starla

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Brown, Blue, Apricot, Black, Camel, Lake, Coffee, Dustyblue, Oatmeal, Orange, Olive, Navy, Plum. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
